subdivision_of_building: extension to the car park in grasscrete finish
description: Installation of an overflow car park to the rear of the existing car park
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: 122/CP/SK00 Rev P1, 122/CP/SK01 Rev P1, 122/CP/SK02 Rev P1, 122/CP/SK03 Rev P1, received 24 April 2023; Fire Safety Statement received 28 April 2023; Hamilton 20W LED Bollard Product Specification, Outdoor Lighting Report, Horizontal Illuminance (lux) Plan received 19 June 2023; 122/CP/SK04 Rev P3 received 21 June 2023.

Condition : 3 - The electric vehicle charging point as shown on the approved plan 122/CP/SK04 Rev P3 shall be installed and all active charging points made operational before the overflow parking area  is first brought into use and shall be permanently retained as such thereafter.

Condition : 4 - Before the overflow parking area hereby permitted is first brought into use, an updated Travel Plan in accordance with current Council and TfL guidance comprising immediate, continuing and long-term measures to promote and encourage a reduction in car use shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved Travel Plan shall be implemented upon occupation, and thereafter monitored and reviewed in accordance with the agreed Travel Plan targets and timescales to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Before the overflow parking area hereby permitted is first brought into use, an updated Car Parking Management Plan shall first be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details and shall be maintained for the lifetime of the development, unless the prior written approval of the local planning authority is obtained to secure any variation.
Condition : 6 - The lighting hereby permitted shall only be operated when the overflow car park is in use.
